name: War Croquet
description:
This game was created in a weekend from the Fat Shark Game Jam 2022 in Boden Sweden. The theme for this Game Jam was "Ball(s)".

Compete and reach the final flag before anyone else. In War Croquet, each player takes turn to push their ball through a hostile landscape; filled with danger and challenges.

Controls:
1. Hold the left mouse button and drag the mouse cursor to aim and adjust the push force.

2. Release the left mouse to push the ball.

Credits:

Gustav Englund - Programmer

Leo Raitaniemi - Programmer

Rasmus Möllerstedt - Pixel Art

Kevin - Background Art

Johan Rosenberg - Level Design
